    "# Parsers\n",
    "Simply put, a parser processes raw data into one of the main data formats in IMPACT. Often, this is done line by line. Here we demonstrate the creation of a new parser for data from the spectromax plate reader - it's format is relatively heterogeneous."
   ]
  },
